TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension, class System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension
Public MustInherit Class ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement Inherits TransportBindingElement Implements IPolicyExportExtension, IWsdlExportExtension
type ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement = class inherit TransportBindingElement interface IPolicyExportExtension interface IWsdlExportExtension

summary.span: 使用連線導向傳輸 (例如 TCP 和具名管道) 常用的額外屬性，補充基底 的抽象類別。

span.span: An abstract class that supplements the base with additional properties that are common to connection-oriented transports such as TCP and named pipes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以文件記錄這個類別是為了讓您更了解傳輸階層架構，而且不應該直接呼叫。This class is documented to give a more complete understanding of the transports hierarchy and is not expected to be directly called. 建構函式會是內部的以避免直接建構與叫用。The constructor is internal to avoid direct construction and invocation. 您可以從 和 衍生類別 (Derived Class) 呼叫這個繫結項目的公用屬性。The public properties of this binding element can be called from the derived classes and .

summary.span: 判斷是否可以建置指定之型別的通道處理站。

span.span: Determines whether a channel factory of the specified type can be built.

returns.span: 如果能建置通道處理站，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if a channel factory can be built; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您應該在嘗試建立通道處理站之前呼叫這個方法。You should call this method before trying to create a channel factory. 如果 `TChannel` 是 ，只有在緩衝處理模式中這個方法才會傳回 `true`。If `TChannel` is this method returns `true` only when in buffered mode. 如果 `TChannel` 是 ，只有在資料流處理模式中這個方法才會傳回 `true`。If `TChannel` is this method returns `true` only when in streaming mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您應該在嘗試建立通道接聽程式之前呼叫這個方法。You should call this method before trying to create a channel listener. 如果 `TChannel` 是 ，只有在緩衝處理模式中這個方法才會傳回 `true`。If `TChannel` is this method returns `true` only when in buffered mode. 如果 `TChannel` 是 ，只有在資料流處理模式中這個方法才會傳回 `true`。If `TChannel` is this method returns `true` only when in streaming mode.

summary.span: 取得或設定 ，決定通道在中斷連接之前，可以處於初始化狀態中的最長時間。

span.span: Gets or sets a that determines the maximum time a channel can be in the initialization status before being disconnected.

value.span: ，通道初始化要求將在此時間範圍過後逾時。

span.span: A after which a channel initialization request times out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會決定需要多少時間的 TCP 連接可以使用.NET Framing 通訊協定自行驗證。This property determines how long a TCP connection can take to authenticate itself using the .NET Framing protocol. 用戶端必須先傳送一些初始資料，讓伺服器有足夠的資訊來執行驗證。A client needs to send some initial data before the server has enough information to perform authentication. 逾時會故意設定為小於 ReceiveTimeout (10 分鐘)，使未經驗證的惡意用戶端無法長時間保持與伺服器的連接。This timeout is intentionally made smaller than the ReceiveTimeout (10 min) so that malicious unauthenticated clients do not keep the connections tied up to the server for long. 預設值為 30 秒。The default value is 30 seconds.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ConnectionBufferSize { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.ConnectionBufferSize : int with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定用來在用戶端或服務的網路上，傳輸已序列化訊息區塊 (Chunk) 的緩衝區大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the buffer used to transmit a chunk of the serialized message on the wire from the client or service.
The size of the connection buffer.
The default value is 8192 bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個值可以變更，以根據平均訊息大小和交換模式提供更佳的輸送量。This value can be changed to provide better throughput based on average message sizes and exchange patterns.

span.span: The value is less than zero.

span.span: Type of the property.
The binding context.

summary.span: 從繫結堆疊取得屬性，如果有的話。

span.span: Gets properties from the binding stack, if present.

returns.span: 來自繫結堆疊的 物件，如果有的話。

span.span: A object from the binding stack, if present.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會接收繫結內容當做輸入參數，該參數表示繫結項目的堆疊。This method receives a binding context as an input parameter, which represents the stack of binding elements. 堆疊中每個繫結項目都可以處理查詢本身、委派查詢，或兩者的組合。Each binding element in the stack can handle the inquiry itself, delegate the inquiry, or a combination of the two. 如果是委派查詢，每個繫結項目都可以修改內容。Each binding element can modify the context if it delegates the inquiry. 然而，傳輸繫結項目會處理查詢本身。However, a transport binding element handles the inquiry itself. 這個方法會由繫結項目以及執行階段物件 (如 、 和 ) 所實作。This method is implemented by binding elements as well as by the run-time objects such as , , and .

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出在比對 URI 時主機名稱是否會用來取用服務。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the hostname is used to reach the service when matching on the URI.

value.span: 值，指出當傳送傳入要求至端點 URI 時，是否要包含主機名稱。

span.span: The value that indicates whether the hostname is included when routing incoming requests to an endpoint URI.

value.span: 預設值為 ，會在比較時忽略主機名稱與連接埠號碼。

span.span: The default value is , which ignores the hostname and port number in the comparison.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需其他的值及其描述，請參閱 。See the enumeration for further values and their descriptions.

span.span: The value is not a valid .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxBufferSize { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxBufferSize : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要使用之緩衝區的大小上限。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum size of the buffer to use.

summary.span: 對於已進行資料流處理的訊息，這個值至少應為訊息標頭的最大可能大小 (可在緩衝模式中讀取)。

span.span: For streamed messages, this value should be at least the maximum possible size of the message headers, which are read in buffered mode.

value.span: 記憶體中用於緩衝傳入訊息的位元組數目上限。

span.span: The maximum number of bytes that are used to buffer incoming messages in memory.
The default value is 65,536 bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對於已進行資料流處理的訊息，這個屬性只適用於訊息標頭；對於經過緩衝處理的訊息，這個屬性適用於整個訊息。For streamed messages this property only applies to the message headers; for buffered messages it applies to the entire message. 這個屬性的值必須小於或等於 ，並且必須大於訊息標頭的大小，否則通道會擲回例外狀況。The value of this property must be less than or equal to and must be larger than the size of the headers of the message or the channel throws an exception. 如果接收到超過能夠緩衝的資料，通道便會擲回 ，其中包含 當做內部例外狀況。If you receive more data than you can buffer the channel throws a , which contains a as an inner exception.

span.span: The value is less than or equal to zero.

summary.span: 取得或設定訊息區塊或完整訊息在送出之前，可以在記憶體中保持緩衝的最大時間間隔。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum interval of time that a chunk of a message or a full message can remain buffered in memory before being sent out.

value.span: ，指定訊息區塊或完整訊息在送出之前，可以在記憶體中保持緩衝的最大時間間隔。預設值是 2 秒。

span.span: A that specifies the maximum interval of time that a chunk of a message or a full message can remain buffered in memory before being sent out. The default value is 2 seconds.

value.span: 只有在傳出訊息的 屬性設定為 時，這個屬性才有意義。

span.span: This property is only meaningful if the property of an outgoing message is set to .

value.span: 否則，就會忽略這個值並且立即傳送訊息。

span.span: Otherwise, this value is ignored and messages are sent immediately.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 為 `false`，則會忽略該訊息的這個屬性。If is `false` then this property is ignored for that message.

span.span: The value is less than zero.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxPendingAccepts { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxPendingAccepts : int with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定服務可使其等待接聽程式以處理服務之連入連線的通道最大數目。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of channels a service can have waiting on a listener for processing incoming connections to the service.

value.span: 服務可在接聽程式上等待的通道數上限。

span.span: The maximum number of channels a service can have waiting on a listener.

value.span: 預設值是 2 \* 處理器數目。

span.span: The default value is 2 \* number of processors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會限制伺服器可以在接聽程式上等待的通道數量。This property limits the number of channels that the server can have waiting on a listener. MaxPendingAccepts 太低時，會有一小段時間間隔讓所有等待中的通道開始提供連接服務，但不會有任何新的通道開始接聽。When MaxPendingAccepts is too low, there will be a small interval of time in which all of the waiting channels have started servicing connections, but no new channels have begun listening. 在這段時間間隔內出現的連接都會失敗，因為伺服器上沒有任何要等待的連接。A connection can arrive during this interval and will fail because nothing is waiting for it on the server. 這個屬性可以藉由將 屬性設為較大數目的方式進行設定。This property can be configured by setting the property to a larger number.

span.span: The value is less than or equal to zero.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxPendingConnections { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxPendingConnections : int with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定服務上等待分派之連線的數目上限。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of connections awaiting dispatch on the service.

value.span: 服務上等待分派之傳入連線的數目上限。

span.span: The maximum number of inbound connections awaiting dispatch on the service.

value.span: 預設值為 12 \* 處理器數量。

span.span: The default value is 12 \* number of processors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性控制傳輸已接受但未經 ServiceModel 發送器擷取的連接數量。This property controls how many connections a transport has accepted but have not been picked up by the ServiceModel Dispatcher. 若要設定這個值，請使用繫結上的 `MaxConnections` 或繫結項目上的 `maxOutboundConnectionsPerEndpoint`。To set this value, use `MaxConnections` on the binding or `maxOutboundConnectionsPerEndpoint` on the binding element. 當堆疊中較高層呼叫 `AcceptDispatch` 時，該連線就會從等待分派的連線佇列中移除。When a higher layer in the stack calls `AcceptDispatch`, that connection is removed from the queue of connections awaiting dispatch.

span.span: The value is less than or equal to zero.

span.span: The that you can use to modify the exporting process.

param.name: context
param.span: 您可以用於插入自訂原則判斷提示的 。

span.span: The that you can use to insert your custom policy assertion.

summary.span: 匯出關於繫結的自訂原則判斷提示。

span.span: Exports a custom policy assertion about bindings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會寫入 WSDL 資訊繫結相關的陳述式特定合約所公開，並由 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 用來傳達給用戶端的繫結堆疊中的這個自訂繫結項目存在。This method writes binding-related statements into the WSDL information exposed by a particular contract and is used by Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) to communicate to clients the existence of this custom binding element in the binding stack. 這個方法採用兩個參數： 和 物件。This method takes two parameters: the and objects. 您可以使用 、 和 方法，取得已經在各種範圍匯出的原則判斷提示的集合。Use the , , and methods to obtain collections of policy assertions that have already been exported at various scopes. 接著使用這個方法將您自己的原則判斷提示新增至適當的集合中。Then use this method to add your own policy assertions to the appropriate collection. 屬性會公開正在匯出的端點的 。The property exposes the for the endpoint that is being exported. 這可讓這個方法正確限定其匯出原則判斷提示的範圍。This allows this method to correctly scope their exported policy assertions. 例如，程式碼中的安全性屬性可能會將行為加入至 ，指出應在何處加入安全性原則判斷提示。For example, security attributes in code may add behaviors to the that indicate where security policy assertions should be added. 在自訂原則判斷提示附加至 WSDL 資訊之後，用戶端就可以實作 介面來偵測及匯入自訂繫結判斷提示。Once custom policy assertions have been attached to the WSDL information, clients can detect and import the custom binding assertions by implementing an interface.

span.span: or is .
